t:
“Dad, dad,” the little boy screamed as the men
with the ski mask drove
away with him.



The dad stood in the
driveway, smiling, with a
suitcase full of cash.
c:
When the men offered to take the boy away, he had offered them the suitcase of cash to take it away. Finally, he could smile, relived, able to get rid of it.



#father #son #men #kidnap #cry #helpless #humantrafficking #money
